pullrequest.title: Switch to six independent GPS sensor noise models

content.raw: I have changed this back to an ```int``` to preserve compatibility with the ```MultiCamera``` sensor. As far as I can tell, this sensor can define an abritrary number of noise streams --- one for each camera. So, it is impossible to enumerate these cameras in advance. The ```enum SensorNoiseType``` type can be cast to an ```int``` easily, so I hope that this isn't an issue.
content.html: I have changed this back to an int to preserve compatibility with the MultiCamera sensor. As far as I can tell, this sensor can define an abritrary number of noise streams --- one for each camera. So, it is impossible to enumerate these cameras in advance. The enum SensorNoiseType type can be cast to an int easily, so I hope that this isn't an issue.
